column1: We have fun with children who come to the shop with their parents. Sometimes
column2: mother has to serve as referee as well as help customers. I think that she has superpowers! When we become too noisy
column4: "Now sit quietly and watch TV." She always adds
column6: while we take a break!" If we don't have schoolwork
column7: sometimes mother asks me or my older sister to help her. I am not always ready to help. But I do it because I know she works so hard. As we walk home from the shop with the sun setting
column8: we talk about our day. We have to hurry to keep up with her
column9: but we love walking and talking with mother. She makes sure that we do homework and have time to play. She makes sure that we eat vegetables and fruits
